DEMO_315_MSG_010:
̃... I've never seen you 'round here before. 
No matter... I was locked in this coffin an' you saved me.
ā
DEMO_315_MSG_020:
̃If you aren't from Polar Park, then... ? 
W-W-Wait! That thing on your head! Could you be... !?
ā
DEMO_315_MSG_030: ̃Ah, so you're ȁ... the one Lucia often spoke of... !
DEMO_315_MSG_040:
̃Allow me to introduce myself... the name's Silver. 
I once ruled over the Eastern side of Polar Park.
ā
DEMO_315_MSG_050: ̃My most trusted retainer betrayed me, however. He captured me and left me to rot, here in this sorry place.
DEMO_315_MSG_060: ̃ȁ, did you have a chance to meet with the new Boss of the East side?
DEMO_315_MSG_070:
̃I see... so that bastard Yetas did indeed overthrow
me, and he stole that necklace from me, as well!
DEMO_315_MSG_080:
̃I knew something was off, the day I lost it...
He'd been cooking that scheme up for quite a while, then...
ā
DEMO_315_MSG_090:
̃However, he should've finished me off. 
Now, I'll have to formally repay him... !
